build.headline: Build a landing page in 10 minutes
build.subHeadline: Create a high-quality landing page in no time, and start promoting your business and generating leads quickly.
build.desc1: Choose your ideal template and effortlessly build a landing page. Our intuitive design makes it user-friendly, even for those not familiar with technology.
build.desc2: Tap into the potential of AI for generating engaging copy for your landing page. We simplifie content creation, crafting compelling narratives that resonate with your audience.
build.desc3: Every landing page is set to be responsive and looks great on all devices, ensuring accessibility for everyone.
build.desc4: Easily add headings, links, paragraphs, and apply various text styles, including bold, italic, underline, etc.
build.desc5: All landing pages are optimized for search engines by default, and you can customize the SEO fields to suit your specific needs.
build.desc6: Restrict access to your landing pages by keeping them password-protected for a select group of users.
build.desc7: Invite team members to collaborate directly on your landing pages. Streamline workflow, share ideas, and create compelling content together.

pitch.headline: Pitch an idea and convince the audience
pitch.subHeadline: Convince the audience that your idea is worth their attention and investment, and encourage them to take the desired action.
pitch.desc1: Share your landing pages instantly with one click. Reach your audience faster, spread your ideas wider, and make your online presence felt.
pitch.desc2: Use your own domain name to create a more professional-looking and cohesive experience for your customers.
pitch.desc3: Get your content stand out and attract more attention on social media with custom title, description, image, and other information.
pitch.desc4: Highlight the key benefits and features of your product, and explain how it solves specific problems that your target customers have.
pitch.desc5: Showcase your product, service, or other visual content in an engaging way to your customers that your offering is worth investing in.
pitch.desc6: Show testimonials and ratings to build trust and credibility with potential customers.

validate.headline: Maximize engagement to ensure success
validate.subHeadline: Benchmark with your customers to test the idea, gather interests, insights, and initial funding, and ensure that you have the potential to succeed.
validate.desc1: View detailed information, including the number of visitors, page visits, top source, geo-location, and more.
validate.desc2: Build a list of interested individuals to keep them engaged and informed about your product development and offer.
validate.desc3: Easily collect payments, track your income and manage your paid subscribers.
validate.desc4: Add a simple form that users can fill out to provide their thoughts, opinions, and suggestions about your product or service.
validate.desc5: Get insights faster. Add user-friendly online polls to understand the needs and preferences of your target audience.
